content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have a fuel source before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using entities without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have a fluid source before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
- entity positions (x, y coordinates)
- entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
